pageTitle: Portland State College of Urban & Public Affairs: School of Community Health | Community Health Education
textBeforeTable: Required Coursework Undergraduate Advising Sheet Common core courses Students pursuing a concentration in community health education must complete: This area of study is for those students who want to pursue careers in community health promotion and disease prevention. It blends public health and related research with a range of strategies such as community organizing, behavior change, public education, and policy development to help create healthy environments. Health educators seek both to aid in the voluntary selection of healthy behavior patterns by individuals, and to encourage the development of environmental conditions that support good health.
